parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the request source. Set the value to **sas**.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset group.

parameters.name: GroupingId
parameters.description: The ID of the server group to which the server belongs. The quarantined file is located on the server.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: QuaraTag
parameters.description: The unique ID of the quarantined file.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the quarantined file that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **quaraFailed**: The file fails to be quarantined.
*   **quaraDone**: The file is quarantined.
*   **quaraing**: The file is being quarantined.
*   **rollbackFailed**: The system fails to cancel quarantining the file.
*   **rollbackDone**: The system cancelled quarantining the file.
*   **rollbacking**: The system is cancelling quarantining the file.
